thread.title: SEGA Announces Football Manager Mobile 2016 for Android & iOS
thread.title_full: SEGA Announces Football Manager Mobile 2016 for Android & iOS - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: SEGA Announces Football Manager Mobile 2016 for Android & iOS
text: Well-known game publisher and developer SEGA has just announced a new football manager simulator title for mobile devices. Previously known as Football Manager Handheld, the new games will be launched as Football Manager Mobile 2016. According to SEGA, the game will be available for download on both Android and iOS platforms just in time for holiday season. The game is... Â»
